Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at 47th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 51st and Halsted due to street blockage near 47th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 51st and Halsted due to street blockage near 47th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
